cards.title: Our Unique Culinary Creations
cards.cardContent: A unique combination of Mediterranean and Italian pizza, topped with Mascarphone, proscuitto, figs, grando panado, honey and arugula.

cards.title: This Month's Promotions
cards.cardContent:
Featuring mouthwatering combinations with a choice of five different salads, six enticing appetizers, six main
        entrees and five choicest desserts. Free flowing bubbly and soft drinks. All for just $19.99 per person

cards.title: Meet our Culinary Specialists
cards.cardContent: Award winning three-star Michelin chef with wide International experience having worked closely with whos-who in the culinary world, he specializes in creating mouthwatering Mediterranean-Italian experiences.
